subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: After closing with a round of 68 to tie Vijay Singh at 10-under-par 278, Steve Lowery calmly stroked a 7-foot birdie putt to bury a whole lot of doubts and a little bit of heartache.
snippet: After closing with a round of 68 to tie Vijay Singh at 10-under-par 278, Steve Lowery calmly stroked a 7-foot birdie putt to bury a whole lot of doubts and a little bit of heartache.
